entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER, `species_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `size_c_en` TEXT, `size_c_tr` TEXT, `weight_c_en` TEXT, `weight_c_tr` TEXT, `color_c_en` TEXT, `color_c_tr` TEXT, `feeding_c_en` TEXT, `feeding_c_tr` TEXT, `threats_c_en` TEXT, `threats_c_tr` TEXT, `conservation_status_c_en` TEXT, `conservation_status_c_tr` TEXT, `cultural_significance_c_en` TEXT, `cultural_significance_c_tr` TEXT, `physical_characteristics_en` TEXT, `physical_characteristics_tr` TEXT, `natural_habitat_en` TEXT, `natural_habitat_tr` TEXT, `ecosystem_en` TEXT, `ecosystem_tr` TEXT, `feeding_habits_en` TEXT, `feeding_habits_tr` TEXT, `social_structure_and_behaviors_en` TEXT, `social_structure_and_behaviors_tr` TEXT, `reproductive_behaviors_en` TEXT, `reproductive_behaviors_tr` TEXT, `development_of_the_young_en` TEXT, `development_of_the_young_tr` TEXT, `sounds_produced_en` TEXT, `sounds_produced_tr` TEXT, `communication_methods_en` TEXT, `communication_methods_tr` TEXT, `threats_and_dangers_en` TEXT, `threats_and_dangers_tr` TEXT, `conservation_efforts_en` TEXT, `conservation_efforts_tr` TEXT, `conservation_challenges_en` TEXT, `conservation_challenges_tr` TEXT, `cultural_and_historical_significance_en` TEXT, `cultural_and_historical_significance_tr` TEXT, `economic_and_scientific_importance_en` TEXT, `economic_and_scientific_importance_tr` TEXT, `modern_day_perception_en` TEXT, `modern_day_perception_tr` TEXT, `environmental_adaptations_en` TEXT, `environmental_adaptations_tr` TEXT, `evolutionary_processes_en` TEXT, `evolutionary_processes_tr` TEXT, `observed_interesting_behaviors_en` TEXT, `observed_interesting_behaviors_tr` TEXT, `ethological_insights_en` TEXT, `ethological_insights_tr` TEXT, `interesting_and_fun_facts_en` TEXT, `interesting_and_fun_facts_tr` TEXT, `comparative_analysis_en` TEXT, `comparative_analysis_tr` TEXT, `role_in_ecosystem_en` TEXT, `role_in_ecosystem_tr` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`species_id`) REFERENCES `Species`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `species_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `name` TEXT, `image_path` TEXT NOT NULL, `image_url` TEXT, `image_order` INTEGER NOT NULL, `created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, `updated_at` TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`species_id`) REFERENCES `Species`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `scientific_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `class_en` TEXT NOT NULL, `class_tr` TEXT NOT NULL, `phylum_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `kingdom_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `image_path` TEXT, `image_url` TEXT, `created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, `updated_at` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`phylum_id`) REFERENCES `Phylums`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION , FOREIGN KEY(`kingdom_id`) REFERENCES `Kingdoms`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `scientific_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `family_en` TEXT NOT NULL, `family_tr` TEXT NOT NULL, `order_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `kingdom_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `image_path` TEXT, `image_url` TEXT, `created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, `updated_at` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`order_id`) REFERENCES `Orders`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION , FOREIGN KEY(`kingdom_id`) REFERENCES `Kingdoms`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `scientific_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `genus_en` TEXT NOT NULL, `genus_tr` TEXT NOT NULL, `family_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `kingdom_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, `updated_at` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`family_id`) REFERENCES `Families`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION , FOREIGN KEY(`kingdom_id`) REFERENCES `Kingdoms`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `habitat_category_en` TEXT NOT NULL, `habitat_category_tr` TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `scientific_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `order_en` TEXT NOT NULL, `order_tr` TEXT NOT NULL, `class_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `kingdom_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `image_path` TEXT, `image_url` TEXT, `created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, `updated_at` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`class_id`) REFERENCES `Classes`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION , FOREIGN KEY(`kingdom_id`) REFERENCES `Kingdoms`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `scientific_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `phylum_en` TEXT NOT NULL, `phylum_tr` TEXT NOT NULL, `kingdom_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `image_path` TEXT, `image_url` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`kingdom_id`) REFERENCES `Kingdoms`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `scientific_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `name_en` TEXT NOT NULL, `name_tr` TEXT NOT NULL, `genus_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `kingdom_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `introduction_en` TEXT NOT NULL, `introduction_tr` TEXT NOT NULL, `recognition_and_interaction` INTEGER, `updated_at` TEXT NOT NULL, `created_at` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`genus_id`) REFERENCES `Genuses`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION , FOREIGN KEY(`kingdom_id`) REFERENCES `Kingdoms`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `isRemovable` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `isArchive` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `pos` INTEGER NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`listId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `speciesId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `pos` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`listId`, `speciesId`), FOREIGN KEY(`speciesId`) REFERENCES `Species`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`listId`) REFERENCES `Lists`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_ListSpecies_speciesId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ListSpecies_speciesId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`speciesId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `titleEn` TEXT NOT NULL, `titleTr` TEXT NOT NULL, `contentTypeId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `destinationTypeId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `destinationId` INTEGER, `kingdomId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `saveKey` TEXT, `itemPosIndex` INTEGER NOT NULL, `modifiedTime` TEXT NOT NULL, `imagePath` TEXT, `imageUrl` TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(`kingdomId`) REFERENCES `Kingdoms`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, `lang_code` TEXT NOT NULL, `modified_date_time` TEXT NOT NULL, `history_type_id` INTEGER NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER, `species_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `size_c_en` TEXT, `size_c_tr` TEXT, `color_c_en` TEXT, `color_c_tr` TEXT, `flowering_time_c_en` TEXT, `flowering_time_c_tr` TEXT, `cultural_importance_c_en` TEXT, `cultural_importance_c_tr` TEXT, `conservation_status_c_en` TEXT, `conservation_status_c_tr` TEXT, `medicinal_benefits_c_en` TEXT, `medicinal_benefits_c_tr` TEXT, `potential_harm_c_en` TEXT, `potential_harm_c_tr` TEXT, `physical_characteristics_en` TEXT, `physical_characteristics_tr` TEXT, `natural_habitat_en` TEXT, `natural_habitat_tr` TEXT, `ecosystem_en` TEXT, `ecosystem_tr` TEXT, `growth_conditions_en` TEXT, `growth_conditions_tr` TEXT, `development_process_en` TEXT, `development_process_tr` TEXT, `flowering_time_and_characteristics_en` TEXT, `flowering_time_and_characteristics_tr` TEXT, `reproduction_methods_en` TEXT, `reproduction_methods_tr` TEXT, `role_in_ecosystem_en` TEXT, `role_in_ecosystem_tr` TEXT, `economic_value_en` TEXT, `economic_value_tr` TEXT, `environmental_adaptations_en` TEXT, `environmental_adaptations_tr` TEXT, `evolutionary_processes_en` TEXT, `evolutionary_processes_tr` TEXT, `cultural_context_en` TEXT, `cultural_context_tr` TEXT, `historical_usage_en` TEXT, `historical_usage_tr` TEXT, `threats_and_dangers_en` TEXT, `threats_and_dangers_tr` TEXT, `conservation_efforts_en` TEXT, `conservation_efforts_tr` TEXT, `medicinal_uses_and_benefits_en` TEXT, `medicinal_uses_and_benefits_tr` TEXT, `potential_harm_and_side_effects_en` TEXT, `potential_harm_and_side_effects_tr` TEXT, `noteworthy_characteristics_en` TEXT, `noteworthy_characteristics_tr` TEXT, `surprising_facts_en` TEXT, `surprising_facts_tr` TEXT, `interesting_and_fun_facts_en` TEXT, `interesting_and_fun_facts_tr` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`id`), FOREIGN KEY(`species_id`) REFERENCES `Species`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`category_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `species_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`category_id`, `species_id`), FOREIGN KEY(`species_id`) REFERENCES `Species`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`category_id`) REFERENCES `HabitatCategories`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select L.id, L.name, L.isRemovable, L.isArchive, L.pos listPos,
     count(LS.speciesId) itemCounts, ifnull(max(LS.pos),0) contentMaxPos 
     from Lists L left join ListSpecies LS on  L.id = LS.listId
     group by L.id

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS select K.id kingdom_id, P.id phylum_id, C.id class_id, O.id order_id, F.id family_id, 
        G.id genuse_id, S.id species_id
        FROM Kingdoms K
        inner join Phylums P on K.id = P.kingdom_id
        inner join Classes C on P.id = C.phylum_id
        inner join Orders O on C.id = O.class_id
        inner join Families F on O.id = F.order_id
        inner join Genuses G on F.id = G.family_id
        inner join Species S  on G.id = S.genus_id
